text:
@narendramodi @Statsmin Why are we not investing in making our medical infrastructure very strong?
I am not really sure if any of the talks are helping.
It's high time that we act responsibly to save the nation of this crisis.
#COVID19 #CoronavirusLockdown #CoronaUpdatesInIndia #coronavirus #Lockdown4
